Om namah shivaya. The sacred sound that connects us to the divine consciousness.
Dharma is the eternal law that governs all existence, guiding us toward righteousness.
Karma teaches us that every action has consequences, weaving the fabric of our destiny.
Moksha is the ultimate liberation, freedom from the cycle of birth and death.
Yoga means union - the joining of individual consciousness with universal consciousness.
Ahimsa is non-violence in thought, word, and deed, the foundation of all spiritual practice.
Satyam param dhimahi - we meditate on the highest truth that illuminates all understanding.
Vasudhaiva kutumbakam - the world is one family, all beings are interconnected.
Aham brahmasmi - I am Brahman, the realization of one's true divine nature.
Tat tvam asi - thou art that, recognizing the divine essence in all beings.
